```{r setup}
library(MetabAnalyse)
```

A vignette to understand the core concept of the library and its uses. 
This library has been developed to assist biologists to study longitudnal metabolomics data without the need of skilled coding.

Modules/set of analysis that are available:

1) Data Preparation and Packing
2) Study Characteristics
3) Gaussian Graphical Models
4) Regression
5) Metabotype conservation index
